text: Iwanu awo wakuja namwe bila chinyala mne ipfihungo pfenu pfa unoghelo. Weghala na mabambalawe ghehile ighodaha kuihinya imeli, wawo ka iwadimi iweghutitsa iwenyegho waliheka. Weghala ne ghamawingu ighalihela mvula, ighoghulusighwa na libeho, weghala ne imibiki ilihela ghamatunda chipindi cho ukupfuna, iing'olighwe na iinyalile ghendo.
